thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text: Our real estate agent told us to get rid of some of the extras and depersonalize our house so the new buyer(s) can imagine themselves living in our house. The storage locker located in a clean, climate controlled building was the answer. This building was the former Canadian Tire Store located about a mile from our house. I rented a 7x10x8 ft. Locker. A week later it is still only half full. I found it to be very clean and the people on the front desk were helpful. I would recommend this facility to anyone. We did just that and sold our house in 1 day.
